local_intent: Execute grasp: ensure white_plate visible, align precisely, perform pick using precomputed grasp_white_plate, verify grasp stability.
assumptions: grasp_white_plate was produced by an earlier ComputeGraspPose (as in the global tree)
white_plate is within reachable workspace and visible to sensors
gripper is operational and in a state to close
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION by implementing the grasp phase: perception -> precise approach/align -> pick action -> stability check using binned timeout and tolerance values from the node library.
